column4: hey folks.  why is it that whenever i try and open a .css file (plain old unformatted text) in a fresh Ubuntu 5.04 installation, it doesn't recognize it.  Thus, I try to open it with gedit.  When I click "Ok", it says "Could not add application to the application database" ------ how do i get rid of this?
its making it impossible for me to be halfway productive
I don't mean to be impatient, but did anyone see my question above?
about the css, i really dont know
